alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 11:43AM AKST until January 10 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and light freezing drizzle. Additional snow accumulation of 4 to 8 inches expected. * WHERE...Haines, and Haines Highway. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing and drifting snow may make removal difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a chance snow could mix with freezing rain at times. A change over to rain could happen Monday evening and would come with a wind shift to the southeast. If the wind shift does not happen, then additional snow should be expected.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
